3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Minimal perspective distortion is visible in some areas, slightly affecting viewing angle score.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The overall layout, room configuration, and wall placements are highly accurate. Some minor discrepancies in the exact proportion of a few openings or very small niches.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are very good, with most major elements present and correctly oriented. Minor stylistic differences in some furniture details, but functionality is preserved.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent structural clarity and lighting. Consistent material usage. The background is clean, contributing to good presentation. No major artifacts.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been converted into an excellent and geometrically faithful 3D isometric cutaway model, maintaining high accuracy in layout and interior elements.
